text: Shim Jung-sub (, or ; born 21 February 1991) is a South Korean long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male long- distance runners Category:South Korean male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of South Korea Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for South Korea
title: Shim Jung-sub
